      public CustomerServiceImpl(UserDAO userDAO, BookDAO bookDAO, HistoryDAO historyDAO)
      The constructor of CustomerServiceImpl designed for using with Mockito tests.

      userDAO - data access object class which provides access to user's data
      bookDAO - data access object class which provides access to book data
      historyDAO - data access object class which provides access to history data

  • Method Details

    • addBookToCustomer

      public String addBookToCustomer(String author, String title, String username, String password) throws ServiceException
      The method addBookToCustomer(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) is used for searching in the userDAO required Customer username and pass parameters. Title and author parameters need for searching in the bookDAO required Book. Found Book add to Customer and with helping userDAO happens update of Data Source. Using historyDAO with Customer happen search CustomerHistory and following update Data Source.
      Specified by:
      addBookToCustomer in interface CustomerService
      Parameters:
      author - the full name of author.
      title - the title of the book which needs to find.
      username - the nickname of the user who tries to find book.
      password - the user's password.
      Returns:
      a string of information about the book which was taken.
      Throws:
      ServiceException

    • showCustomerBooks

      public String showCustomerBooks(String username, String password) throws ServiceException
      The method showCustomerBooks(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) is used for demonstrating a list of the books which the Customer has in the order of date of taking. The first part of the response before the delimiter "," has the highest list index of Customer's books.
      Specified by:
      showCustomerBooks in interface CustomerService
      Parameters:
      username - the nickname of the user who tries to see his taken books.
      password - the user's password.
      Returns:
      string response on the format: "[highestListIndex] [,] [responseString]".
      Throws:
      ServiceException

    • returnBook

      public String returnBook(String username, String password, int returnedBookNum) throws ServiceException
      The method returnBook(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, int) is used for removing Book from Customer, add this Book to librarian Data Source and do appropriate record in the CustomerHistory with the date of the returning book.
      Specified by:
      returnBook in interface CustomerService
      Parameters:
      username - the nickname of the user who tries to return the book.
      password - the user's password
      returnedBookNum - order number of the returning book in customer TakenBook list.
      Returns:
      string with information about the returned book.
      Throws:
      ServiceException

    • registration

      public String registration(String username, String name, String password, String age)
      The method create Customer and CustomerHistory objects. These objects write to Data Source using historyDAO and userDAO.
      Specified by:
      registration in interface CustomerService
      Parameters:
      username - the user's nickname which will be required for authorization.
      name - the user's name.
      password - the user's password which will be required for authorization.
      age - the user's age.
      Returns:
      string request to call menu with data about new customer or message about a mistake.
